name: Tappy Golf
description:
The most easy, fun and addicting golf game you'll ever play!
Each hole is procedurally generated. So you'll experience an infinite number of golf holes that are different every time you play!

Just tap the screen to stop the aiming arrow. That's it!

But careful... the arrow gets faster the better you score.

* NO in-app purchases
* NEVER watch an add unless you want to.
* Leaderboards for Overall Scores and Under-Par Streaks

Lots of voxel golfers and courses to unlock.

Endless golf... endless fun! Please enjoy!
